snippet: Microsoft's quarterly profit and revenue sailed past expectations Thursday, as CEO Satya Nadella's push to embrace cloud computing and diversify into mobile devices helped lift sales by 25 percent....

headline.print_headline: Cloud Business Lifts Microsoft's Quarterly Results
headline.main: Cloud Business Lifts Microsoft's Quarterly Results

lead_paragraph: Microsoft's quarterly profit and revenue sailed past expectations Thursday, as CEO Satya Nadella's push to embrace cloud computing and diversify into mobile devices helped lift sales by 25 percent.
